content.text:
[@mix](@ye+QM09iPcDJD6YvQYjoQc7sLF/IFhmNbEqgdzQo3lQ=.ed25519) 

Just wanted to let you know how much I got out of your video on flume, watching that plus having the code in the git repo took me from "what the hell is flumedb" to writing [a pull request](https://github.com/flumedb/flumedb/pull/19) (which I'm sure will need work, but still). Anyway, I thought it was really neat that you put that together. Thanks!

:heart:
